description: Locations of all lakes in Colorado. Provided by CDOT, the data is best suited for cartography, and not geographic analysis. Contains the name, area and perimeter. The data is best suited for cartography, and not geographic analysis. Look to USGS for a better source of analytic data.

name: Colorado Lakes
